ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: And no one up to that point had killed the dragon that it was found on? Coincidence?  I doubt there was any coincidence.  Paranoid Bard who needs to relax?
ygData.messageBody:
And no one up to that point had killed the dragon that it was found on?
Coincidence? I doubt there was any coincidence. Paranoid Bard who needs to
relax? Probably.

Hmmm - Bards complain publicly that certain Singing Armor pieces
have never
dropped. Lots of Bumps on the BBS. No response from Verant; but one
assumes they saw the Thread.

A patch goes on the server. THEN a Singing Breatplate is found on a
server.

Could this be coincidence? Did they find an error in the Drop
Tables and
secretly fix it?

We will never know for sure...

Slyde


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
